answers.answer: Theswe could be episodes of petit mal siezures. I would advise a visit to a neurologist. Get a bound notebook and keep track of the symptoms for several weeks.Sometimes these sensations are due to out-of-control diabetes so an hba1c is indicated.There are many possible causes, and tyou don't want to end up having an accident or injuring others while driving.

question: For the past 2 weeks, I have been zoning out, for example I could be doing something, then just zone out, I dont lose conciseness but I feel like im not in my  body. My eyes go blurry, I feel like I am twitching and my head feels like it is spinning. This happens several times each day and varies from a few seconds to a couple of minutes. After, I start shivering and come over freezing cold. Sometimes I am freezing but my face will go bright red and boiling hot.
title: What could cause my symptoms? Could I be having partial seizures?
